title: Headphones and volume - please help!
content:
Hello

I've been trying to get these issues solved which has been very frustrating re my pixel 5:

1) Free headphones. Where are they? I spoke with someone called 'Albert' and he admitted that I should have received the headphone because I purchased the phone and claimed the headphones within the agreed time frames? I was told by Albert to complete a 'contact form' with Sales and they'll get back to me. I did this and I never received a response. 

My claim number is 546-409-768

2) I'm often talking to someone on the phone or watching a video and the volume drops dead. I've tried all the solutions on line but no luck. Can you help? This is very frustrating and it's affecting my work 

I really hope that someone can help me as the above is causing me considerable stress. 

Thanks, 

Sean
